directions: In a large bowl, gently toss together the mangoes, lettuce, walnuts, cranberries, red and green peppers, and carrot. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 6  red lettuce leaves, rinsed, dried, and torn
½  red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced
½  green bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced
title: Mango Walnut Salad
